page.title: 03RECREATION. SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: INTERVIEW WITH AN INTERNATIONAL FOOTBALL REFEREE.(GT HARWOOD) MR R WAS 24 WHEN HE FIRST STARTED REFEREEING.HE BEGAN IN THE ACCRINGTON AND DIST.LEAGUE.NOW HE IS 48 AND HAS RETIRED.HE HAD TO PASS SEVERAL EXAMS TO BECOME A FIRST CLASS REFEREE.HE HAS NOT REFEREED THE F.A.CUP FINAL,BUT HE HAS REFEREED IMPORTANT EUROPEAN MATCHES AND LEAGUE FINALS.HE HAS REFEREED ABOUT 4800 FIRST CLASS GAMES IN 16 YEARS.HE HAS REFEREED ABROAD MANY TIMES AND PARTICULARLY LIKED THE OLYMPIC STADIUM IN ROME HE LIKES TO WATCH LOCAL FOOTBALL MATCHES WHEN HES NOT AWAY REFEREEING HE HAS A SPECIAL INTEREST IN CLITHEROE. IN HIS SPARE TIME HE GOES RUNNING,GOLFING AND PLAYING CRICKET.HE THINKS HOOLIGANISM IS A SOCIAL PROBLEM AND HE HAS REFEREED MATCHES WITH HOOLIGANISM INVOLVED.
